content:
Stay tuned to the NBA playoffs, indeed!

As of our conversation, I don't have real-time information about the current playoff series, but I can suggest some ways for you to stay updated:

1. **NBA website and app**: You can check the official NBA website (nba.com) or download the NBA app to get the latest scores, schedules, and updates on the playoffs.
2. **Sports news websites and apps**: Websites like ESPN, CBS Sports, and Fox Sports, as well as their respective apps, provide up-to-date information on the playoffs, including scores, schedules, and analysis.
3. **Social media**: Follow your favorite teams, players, and sports journalists on social media platforms like Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook to get real-time updates and behind-the-scenes insights.

To get the latest information on the current playoff series, I recommend checking one of these sources. They'll provide you with the number of games left in each series, as well as the schedules and times for upcoming games.

Remember, the NBA playoffs can be unpredictable, and series can go in any direction. Enjoy the excitement, and may your favorite team make it to the Finals!
